[Resilient Mind](/Feats.aspx?ID=3625) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 82</row>

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

</column>

---

You're firm in your convictions and have girded your mind against outside influence. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects. This bonus increases to +2 against mental effects originating from [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160).
